name: sheetable
description: SheetAble is a self-hosted music sheet organizer for musicians. It manages PDF sheet music, supports tagging, search, and setlists, and offers a responsive web UI suitable for tablets on music stands.
features: Sheet library: Organize PDF sheet music in a searchable digital library.
Tagging system: Categorize sheets by composer, genre, difficulty, or custom tags.
Setlist creation: Build and manage setlists for performances or practice sessions.
PDF viewer: Display sheet music with zoom, page navigation, and full-screen mode.
Search functionality: Find sheets quickly by title, composer, tags, or content.
Tablet optimized: Responsive design perfect for music stands and tablets.
Annotation support: Add notes, markings, and highlights to sheet music.
Practice tracking: Log practice sessions and track progress on individual pieces.
Multi-user support: Share libraries with band members or students.
Import tools: Bulk upload PDFs with automatic metadata extraction.
Favorites: Mark frequently used sheets for quick access.
Export options: Download sheets or setlists for offline use or printing.
